lead_paragraph: BROWN--Daniel J. Dan Brown, age 97. July 6, 1919 - July 21, 2016. Beloved husband of the late Norma (Selikoff), and later in life, the late Sybil (Hertzman). Loving father to Ronnie (Jonathan) Halpern, Judie (Harold) Bregman, and Nancy (Rick) Nasoff, and stepfather to Karen (Jerry) Biderman. Adored grandfather of Stephanie (Stuart) Rodnick, Jaclyn (Craig) Bonder, Lisa and Evan (Linnea) Bregman, Lauren (Mitch) Bloom, and Jodi Nasoff. And step-grandfather to Noel (Amanda) Biderman and Sandor (Shonna) Biderman. "Poppy" was great-grandfather to Justin and Jared Rodnick, Ethan and Jordan Bonder, Max Bloom, Abel, Soren, Sasha, Ryan and Romy Biderman. Dan was the "maven" of the family-with limitless knowledge about just about everything, and always willing to share it with all who would listen. Mr. Fix-It, Master Story-Teller, WWII Army Veteran, Turkey Carver, and Fisherman--He will never be forgotten. Service Monday, July 25 at Boulevard Chapel, Hewlett, NY. Donations may be made to the organization of your choice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  BROWN, DANIEL J
